messages.message:
@dg by instabase document translation feature i guess they are referring to the Doc Translation App? That app uses the msft translate api which already supports arabic and hebrew. @jayasooryan can you confirm if these languages are supported at present?

For parity with Co-pilot I don't think we have a comparison right now or if we have plans for it. @Hari any idea who in Product team would have insights on this.

There is an another thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1747717006667639?thread_ts=1747671311.725569&cid=C05BJCNKZAM) related to this: Datafabricx wants to converse with documents across languages. They want to check whether language support can be enabled via API.
@jayasooryan Can we do a quick check on if these languages are supported?

The Doc Translation App doesn't support Right to Left (RTL) written languages. That's why Arabic and Hebrew are not supported at the moment. The current list of supported languages can be found here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AE/pages/2075983873/Doc+Translation). Adding RTL language support will need dev work.

@Balaram @jayasooryan Do we have in the roadmap to support these languages? Let me know if I need to create a PFR for this.
cc:@Nithin
